0:
--------------------
Text: A suikinkutsu (水琴窟 , literally "water koto cave") is a type of Japanese garden ornament and music device.

Triplets:<suikinkutsu
Japanese garden ornament and music device
1:
--------------------
Text: Suikinkutsu:  It consists of an upside down buried pot with a hole at the top.
Triplets:<Suikinkutsu
3:
--------------------
Text: Suikinkutsu:  It is usually built next to a traditional Japanese stone basin called "chōzubachi", part of a "tsukubai" for washing hands before the Japanese tea ceremony.
Triplets:<Suikinkutsu
